text: Foreword We are a great country. With great people. In the last five years I have heard your  stories, your hopes and your dreams. And I have heard too your frustrations.  The countless people working as hard as they possibly can and still struggling to  pay the bills. The young people with great ambitions but great anxieties about  the future. The dedicated staff of our NHS, who are deeply concerned about  its future. And all those who have served our country, are now retired, and ask  where our country is going. This manifesto is inspired by you. I take a simple view. We are a great country, but we can be even better The fundamental truth that runs through this manifesto is that Britain will only  succeed when working people succeed. It is an idea at the heart of my beliefs.  And it drives our better plan for a better future.  It means a country where hard work is rewarded, with high skill, high wage jobs.  An economy built on strong and secure foundations, where we balance the books.  It means building a future for all our young people, so they can get world-class  apprenticeships and access to affordable, higher education. It means strong  public services, rescuing our NHS.  It means strong communities, where power is shared by people in every part of  the country and where we respond to people’s concerns about immigration, with  proper controls.  It means a Britain where everyone plays by the same rules, including those at the  very top of our society. And it means an outward looking country, engaged in the  world for our national interest. For me, the privilege of serving as Prime Minister in our country would be for one  purpose alone: to work every day to help build a country that works again for  working people. This manifesto is our plan to achieve that goal.  Ed Miliband

text: Building world-class infrastructure will be crucial to fostering economic growth.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will create certainty for investors by taking a long-term approach to the major investment decisions facing the country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Following the Davies Review, we will make a swift decision on expanding airport capacity in London and the South East,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: balancing the need for growth and the environmental impact.

text: Scientific discovery and technological innovation will drive economic advancement this century.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: creating a million additional green jobs.

text: This aim will be supported by ambitious domestic carbon reduction targets, including a legal target to remove the carbon from our electricity supply by 2030,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and a major drive for energy efficiency.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will create an Energy Security Board to plan and deliver the energy mix we need, including renewables, nuclear, green gas, carbon capture and storage, and clean coal.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and making the most of the potential for carbon storage.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour’s longer-term approach will drive innovation and build on our strengths as a leader in digital technology.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We are just at the start of the internet revolution.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Digital technology has transformed start-up costs making it easier to run your own business.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: There is a widening in the application of new transformative technologies in the fields of robotics, genetics, 3D printing and Big Data.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our economy is developing a network of connections that will revolutionise innovation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will ensure that all parts of the country benefit from affordable, high speed broadband by the end of the Parliament.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will work with the industry and the regulator to maximise private sector investment and deliver the mobile infrastructure needed to extend coverage and reduce ‘not spots’, including in areas of market failure.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will support community-based campaigns to reduce the proportion of citizens unable to use the internet and help those who need it to get the skills to make the most of digital technology.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our universities are amongst the finest in the world.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Some are already helping our regional economies by forming strong links with industry and creating high-tech clusters.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They have already spun out hundreds of companies creating thousands of jobs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will support this model of knowledge clusters, especially outside the South East.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain’s economy is being held back by the culture of short-termism, which is a major obstacle to the development of productive businesses and industries.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will reform corporate governance to protect our leading firms from the pressure to put tomorrow’s share price before long-term growth potential.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Institutional investors will have a duty to act in the best interests of ordinary savers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will have to prioritise long-term growth over short-term profits for the companies in which they are investing.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will change takeover rules to enhance the role of long-term investors by restricting voting to those already holding shares when a bid is made.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In addition, we will strengthen the public interest test.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will improve the link between executive pay and performance by simplifying pay packages, and requiring investment and pension fund managers to disclose how they vote on top pay
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will make sure employees have a voice when executive pay is set by requiring employee representation on remuneration committees.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In this way we can start to create an economy based on mutual obligations, encouraging employers and employees to build partnerships for improving both business performance and job quality.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Outdated practices, like blacklisting, have no place in a modern economy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our charities, mutuals, co-operatives and social enterprises are pioneering new models of production that enhance social value, promote financial inclusion, and give individuals and communities power and control.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to support and help develop the social economy by improving access for co-operative and mutual organisations to growth finance through the new British Investment Bank.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will consider how to support employee buy-outs when businesses are being sold.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will safeguard the public interest in the Royal Mail, supporting the creation of a staff-led trust for the employee share, and keeping the remaining 30 per cent in public ownership.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also support the universal service obligation, ensuring competition does not undermine it and introducing protections as necessary.

text: Backing small business
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Small businesses are the backbone of our economy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Their creativity and dynamism are vital for raising productivity and competing in the global economy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will give them a voice at the heart of government – a Small Business Administration, which will ensure procurement contracts are accessible and regulations are designed with small firms in mind.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will address rising costs for small businesses and strengthen rules on late payment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will put small businesses first in line for tax cuts.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Instead of cutting Corporation Tax again for the largest firms, we will cut, and then freeze business rates for over 1.5 million smaller business properties.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will develop a banking system that works for businesses in every region and every sector in Britain.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The long-standing problems of our banking system mean that too many small and medium-sized businesses cannot get the finance they need to invest and grow.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will establish a British Investment Bank with the mission to help businesses grow and to create wealth and jobs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will have the resources to improve access to finance for small and medium-sized businesses, and will support a network of regional banks.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will increase competition on the high street.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Following the Competition and Market Authorities inquiry we want a market share test and at least two new challenger banks.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will deal with the scourge of household debt by introducing a new levy on payday lenders, using the funds raised to boost low-cost alternatives like credit unions.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Better work and better pay
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain’s route to prosperity and higher living standards is through more secure and better paid jobs
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: . But Conservative policies are causing whole sectors of the economy to be dragged into a race to the bottom on wages and skills.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Government has weakened employment rights and promoted a hire-andfire culture.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes our economy can only succeed in a race to the top – competing in the world with better work, better pay and better skills.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Too many people do a hard day’s work but remain dependent on benefits.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will raise the National Minimum Wage to more than £8 an hour by October 2019, bringing it closer to average earnings.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give local authorities a role in strengthening enforcement against those paying less than the legal amount.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will support employers to pay more by using government procurement to promote the Living Wage, alongside wider social impact considerations.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our Make Work Pay contracts will give tax rebates to businesses who sign up to paying the Living Wage in the first year of a Labour Government.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Publicly listed companies will be required to report on whether or not they pay the Living Wage.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is hard for Britain to succeed when employees feel insecure and employers are undercut by those using exploitative working practices.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will ban exploitative zero-hours contracts.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Those who work regular hours for more than 12 weeks will have a right to a regular contract.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will abolish the loophole that allows firms to undercut permanent staff by using agency workers on lower pay.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Conservatives have introduced fees of up to £1,200 for employment tribunal claimants, creating a significant barrier to workplace justice.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will abolish the Government’s employment tribunal fee system as part of wider reforms to make sure that affordability is not a barrier to workers having proper access to justice,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: employers get a quicker resolution,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and the costs to the tax payer do not rise.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour is the Party of work, and we value working life.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will push up standards and boost productivity by implementing the commitments in Labour’s Workplace and Business manifestos.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Supporting the next generation
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Over 700,000 of our young people are unemployed
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Too many of them do not have the skills they need for work.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And yet in the past year the number of young people starting apprenticeships has fallen.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Government’s decision to triple university tuition fees leaves young people either starting their working lives burdened by £44,000 of debt, or without a clear alternative path to a decent career.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will cut tuition fees from £9,000 to £6,000 a year, funded by restricting tax relief on pension contributions for the highest earners and clamping down on tax avoidance.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will tackle the growth of unpaid internships because thousands of highly able young people who cannot afford to work for free are locked out of too many of our professions.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce a Compulsory Jobs Guarantee, paid for by a bank bonus tax.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will provide a paid starter job for every young person unemployed for over a year, a job which they will have to take or lose benefits.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For too long we have failed to provide a system which makes the best use of the talents of young people.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will guarantee every school leaver that gets the grades an apprenticeship.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will create thousands more apprenticeships in the public sector, including the civil service.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Every firm getting a major government contract, and every large employer hiring skilled workers from outside the EU, will be required to offer apprenticeships.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give employers more control over apprenticeships funding and standards.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In return, we will ask them to increase the number of high quality apprenticeships in their sectors and supply chains.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also give them the powers to deal with any free-riding employers who do not train.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour’s apprenticeships will be gold-standard qualifications.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will re-focus existing spending away from low-level apprenticeships for older people, and towards a system where apprenticeships are focused on new job entrants, lasting at least two years, and providing level three qualifications or above.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will make sure that apprenticeships can lead to higher level qualifications by creating new Technical Degrees and supporting part-time study.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will be co-funded, co-designed and co-delivered by employers and they will be the priority for expansion within our university system.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Young people who do not have the skills they need should be in training, not on benefits.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will replace out of work benefits for 18 to 21-year-olds with a new Youth Allowance dependent on recipients being in training and targeted at those who need it most.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Mending the markets that people rely on
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will stand up for working families and businesses against vested interests.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will reform the broken markets that people rely on most so that families and businesses get a fair deal.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Energy bills have risen by over £300 since 2010.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Many businesses say energy is the biggest cost they face.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Lack of competition and transparency has allowed the large energy companies to get away with increasing bills when wholesale prices rise, but not cutting them when they fall.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The regulator has failed to take decisive action to protect consumers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will freeze energy bills until 2017, ensuring that bills can fall but not rise, and we will give the regulator the power to cut bills this winter.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: During the freeze, we will reform the energy market so that it delivers fairer prices and a better deal for working families.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The generation and supply businesses of the ‘Big Six’ energy companies will be separated.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will be required to open up their books, and they will have to sell their electricity through an open exchange.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will simplify energy tariffs and make it easier for people to compare prices to get the best deal.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will protect small businesses by ending unfair contracts and automatic rollovers to more expensive tariffs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A tough new energy watchdog will enforce our reforms, with powers to strip energy companies of their licences if they repeatedly harm the interests of consumers, and protect off-grid households.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will bring down energy bills by making homes more energy efficient, delivering a million interest free loans for energy home improvements in the next Parliament.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For those on low incomes, we will make 200,000 homes warm every year, delivered street-by-street by local authorities and community organisations.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Privately rented properties will have to meet a decency standard, bringing warmth to a further three million homes.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The water industry, too, also requires reform.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: One in five people struggle to pay their water bill.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Despite this, only a fraction of customers have benefited from the social tariffs offered by water companies.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Under our reforms all water companies will be required to sign up to a new national affordability scheme, helping those who cannot afford to pay their water bill.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will strengthen the powers of the regulator to change licenses, limit price rises and enforce industry standards.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Living standards have been hit by fare increases on public transport.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Since 2010, rail fares have risen by 20 per cent, leaving passengers paying the highest fares in Europe.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Similarly, bus fares have risen by 27 per cent while at the same time 2,000 bus routes have been cut.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will reform our transport system in order to provide more public control and put the public interest first.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will review the franchising process as a priority to put in place a new system and avoid a repeat of the Conservatives’ franchising fiasco.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A new National Rail body will oversee and plan for the railways and give rail users a greater say in how trains operate.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will legislate so that a public sector operator is allowed to take on lines and challenge the private train operating companies on a level playing field.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Rail fares will be frozen next year to help commuters while we implement reforms.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A strict fare rise cap will be introduced on every route for any future fare rises, and a new legal right for passengers will be created to access the cheapest ticket for their journey.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: City and county regions will be given more power over the way buses are operated in their area.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will be able to decide routes, bear down on fares, drive improvements in services, and bring together trains, buses and trams into a single network with smart ticketing.

text: We will provide world-class health and education services
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our NHS, care services, schools, colleges and other public services make up the essential fabric of our society.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People need them to be able to live secure and fulfilling lives.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain needs them if we are to succeed as a country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But under the Conservatives they are under threat.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The next Labour Government will protect, improve and invest in our public services,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: while giving individuals and communities more control over their design and delivery.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The NHS is one of our great national institutions,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and it is one of Labour’s proudest achievements.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It embodies our belief that by the strength of our common endeavour, we achieve more than we achieve alone.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But the future of the NHS is under threat.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Conservatives have put the wrong values at its heart, and patients are finding it harder to get the care they need.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Care is at the heart of Labour’s values.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: No-one should fear old age or be left to struggle alone caring for a loved one.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But too many older people suffer insecurity, loneliness and exclusion.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And the growing social care crisis is one of the biggest challenges we face.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Since 2010, billions of pounds have been cut from budgets that pay for adult social care.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The result has been 300,000 fewer older people getting vital care services, at the same time as the number of older people in need of care is increasing.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A good education is vital to achieving personal fulfillment and economic prosperity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A good society depends upon an education system that can open minds and teach the skills and knowledge we each need to get on in life.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But our education system is failing to meet the needs of young people who do not follow the traditional academic path from school to university.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our public services are a measure of the strength and decency of our society.

text: But we need a change in how we design them by pushing power down and organising them around individuals and families not centralised bureaucracies.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Good public services also need committed staff who are treated fairly and whose ethos of service is respected.

text: They require decisions on pay that prioritise those on lower incomes, which are evidence-based, and which respect Pay Review Body recommendations rather than brushing them aside irresponsibly.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Government spends far too much money dealing with the symptoms of problems, instead of investing smaller amounts in dealing with their causes.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Every taxpayer pays the cost of low educational achievement, poor aspirations, drink and drug misuse, and criminality.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will promote early-years intervention, supporting young children and their parents and dealing with problems before they get out of hand.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We can save money and create more responsive services by building co-operation between public services and organisations.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Pooling funds across local areas reduces inefficiency and avoids duplication.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Services must be joined up in ways that make sense to the people who use them.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will use digital technology in reforming our public services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People will be able to feed back on services quickly and simply, making sure their voices are heard, stimulating improvement and saving on the costs of service failure.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The NHS
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will rescue our NHS, invest in its future and join up services from home to hospital.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will start with the promise of investment so that the NHS has time to care.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The NHS is struggling with staffing shortages.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Accident and emergency is in crisis, and more people are facing long waits for tests, treatment, or to see a GP.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will invest in 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, and 3,000 more midwives, paid for by a Mansion Tax on properties worth over £2 million, a levy on tobacco firms, and by tackling tax avoidance.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The threshold for the Mansion Tax will rise in line with house prices for these high-value properties, and those on lower incomes will be protected with a right to defer the charge until the property changes hands.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will guarantee people a GP appointment within 48 hours, and on the same day for those who need it.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will create a Cancer Treatments Fund so patients have access to the latest drugs, surgery and radiotherapy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: By 2020, patients will wait no longer than one week for vital cancer tests.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Catching the disease early is critical, so we will raise public awareness of symptoms and make sure there is training and support for GPs in spotting early signs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The answer to the health challenges we face is not to set hospital against hospital, but to join up services around patients’ needs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will repeal the Government’s Health and Social Care Act, scrapping the competition regime and restoring proper democratic accountability for the NHS.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will establish a sensible commissioning framework, based on the principle of an NHS preferred provider, to stop the drive towards privatisation and make sure that NHS services are not destabilised by competition and fragmentation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Where private companies are involved in providing clinical services, we will impose a cap on any profits they can make from the NHS, to ensure that the needs of patients are always put first.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We support the principles behind the negotiations on the Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership Treaty (TTIP).
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will hold the European Commission to account on issues of concern, including the impact on public services and the Investor to State Dispute Settlement Mechanism.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will ensure the NHS is protected from the TTIP treaty.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our health reforms will focus on prevention and early intervention, and joining up services from home to hospital.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: When people cannot get to see their GP, many go to A&E instead.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: When mental health problems are not spotted early, people can deteriorate and need more intensive support.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And when elderly people cannot get the care they need at home, they are more likely to end up in hospital.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The current system is too fragmented.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It was not designed for the growing numbers of people living with chronic conditions or multiple needs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Rather than having three separate systems for dealing with physical, mental and social care, we will create a whole person approach: a single service to meet all of a person’s health and care needs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This will be underpinned by new rights for patients.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Vulnerable older people, disabled people and those with complex needs will be helped to have more control of their lives with the entitlement to a personal care plan designed with them and shaped around their needs, the option of personal budgets where appropriate, and a single named person to coordinate their care.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will also receive better information and advice on managing their condition.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: These changes will help to end the frustration of families sick of being passed from pillar to post between different individuals and agencies.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Commissioning and budgets will be brought together at a local level to join up services and make sure that providers are incentivised to help people stay healthy and outside hospital, rather than simply waiting for them to fall ill.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Mental health will be given the same priority as physical health.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People will have the same right to psychological therapies as they currently have to drugs and medical treatments.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To help address the problem of undiagnosed mental illness, NHS staff training will include mental health.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will increase the proportion of the mental health budget that is spent on children, and make sure that teachers have training so they can identify problems early and link children up with support.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To support young people’s health and wellbeing, we will encourage the development of social and emotional skills, for example through the use of mindfulness to build resilience.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will set out a strategy with the goal of ensuring that the great majority of patients can access talking therapies within 28 days, and that all children who need it can access school-based counselling.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A greater emphasis on prevention and public health is essential, not just to improve outcomes and tackle inequalities, but to ensure the NHS remains sustainable.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For example, 3.2 million people are currently diagnosed with diabetes, and it is estimated that spending on treatment will rise from £10 billion to £17 billion a year over the next 25 years if action is not taken, such as to reduce levels of obesity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will set a new national ambition to improve the uptake of physical activity and take targeted action on those high strength, low cost alcohol products that fuel problem drinking.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will set maximum permitted levels of sugar, salt and fat in foods marketed substantially to children.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Everyone involved in the NHS must learn lessons when things go wrong, for example, from the failings at Mid-Staffordshire and Morecambe Bay.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will prioritise action to improve care quality and patient safety.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In addition to recruiting extra nurses to help provide safe levels of staffing on wards, we want every hospital death to be subject to an appropriate level of review.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also take action to modernise the regulation of healthcare professionals.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Care in older age
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will support people in their older age.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Growing old should be a positive and fulfilling experience.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But our social care system is close to collapse, with older people often receiving visits limited to just 15 minutes, provided by a workforce that is too often undervalued.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour supports measures to cap the costs of care and will prioritise improving the quality of care services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Working with local authorities and care providers, Labour will end time-limited 15-minute visits, introducing year-of-care budgets to incentivise better care in the home.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: By stopping the use of zero-hours contracts, where regular hours are being worked, we will improve the working life of care workers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For older people, the normal setting for care should increasingly be the home, not the hospital.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will recruit 5,000 new home-care workers – a new arm of the NHS – to help care for those with the greatest needs at home.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This will include supporting more people to remain at home at the end of their life, including those who are terminally ill with the greatest care needs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also introduce a system of safety checks to identify risks facing vulnerable older people and enable preventative measures to be put in place, such as grab rails to prevent falling.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The burden of the care crisis is falling on carers, especially women, who account for six in every ten carers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will introduce a new duty on NHS organisations to identify carers so that they can be linked up with the right support.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will ring-fence the money councils get for carers’ breaks to ensure this money gets spent on carers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A high quality education for all our children
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour sees investment in education as an investment both in our children and in the future of the country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will protect the entire education budget, including the early years, schools and post-16 education, so that it rises in line with inflation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: However investment on its own is not enough.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We need to create a route to success for the 50 per cent of young people who do not go down the traditional academic route.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will raise the standard and status of vocational and technical education, with a high quality vocational route from school through to employment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Technical Baccalaureate, a vocational award for 16 to 18-year-olds, will combine a gold-standard qualification accredited by employers, with a quality work placement.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will transform high performing Further Education colleges with strong links to industry, into new specialist Institutes of Technical Education, with a remit to deliver the Technical Baccalaureate and higher-level skills.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will support more young people to gain the core skills they need for employment and further study.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: With Labour, students will continue to study English and Maths to age 18 and undertake work experience between the ages of 14 and 16.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And to ensure young people are equipped to make the best choices for their future, we will introduce a new, independent system of careers advice, offering personalised face-to-face guidance on routes into university and apprenticeships.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We believe fundamentally that a world-class education system is made by excellent teachers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: With Labour, every teacher will need to gain qualified teacher status.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will encourage teaching quality by creating new career routes for teachers who are expert in their subject.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: These teachers will be able to attain a new ‘Master Teacher’ status.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Teachers will also be expected to update their knowledge and skills as a condition of remaining in the profession, and we will support plans for a new College of Teaching.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: These measures will help us close the attainment gap between disadvantaged children and their peers, and work towards all children reading well by age 11.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We have supported the successful ‘Teach First’ since its inception and will continue to do so.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A new School Leadership Institute will support headteachers and improve school leadership.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will accredit gold-standard headship qualifications, support leadership training and development, and identify and develop the school leaders of the future.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Government has attempted to oversee thousands of schools from the centre.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This approach is not working.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Underperformance is going unchallenged and parents do not have enough of a voice.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will introduce new Directors of School Standards at a local level to monitor performance, intervene in underperforming schools and support them to improve.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Where a majority of local parents have concerns about underperformance, or a dip in standards, they will be able to call in their local Director of School Standards to hold a school to account.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will promote innovation in schools.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give all schools freedoms currently only granted to some.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Directors of School Standards will be responsible for commissioning new schools where there is a shortage of school places, encouraging innovative bids from established providers, good local authorities, parents, teachers and entrepreneurs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will also encourage local schools to work together to improve the quality of education.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will end the wasteful and poorly performing Free Schools programme, and switch resources to where they are needed, allowing us to cap class sizes for five, six and seven-year-olds at 30 pupils or under.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Private schools currently benefit from generous state subsidies, including business rates relief worth hundreds of millions of pounds.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We believe they should do more to contribute to raising standards in state education to justify receiving this subsidy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As a condition for continued business rate relief, private schools will be required to form a meaningful partnership with a school, or cluster of schools, in the state sector.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Children develop and learn best when they are secure and happy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We need to help our children develop the creativity, self-awareness and emotional skills they need to get on in life.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce compulsory age-appropriate sex and relationships education
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: . We will encourage all schools to embed character education across the curriculum, working with schools to stop the blight of homophobic bullying.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will:
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: invest £2.5 billion more that the Conservatives to recruit 8,000 more GPs, 20,000 more nurses and 3,000 more midwives
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: join up services from home to hospital, with a single point of contact for all who need it
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: give mental health the same priority as physical health, with a new right to access talking therapies
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: repeal the Government’s privatisation plans, cap profits and put the right values back at the heart of the NHS
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: end time-limited 15 minute social care visits and recruit 5,000 new  home-care workers to support people in their home
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: introduce a new gold-standard Technical Baccalaureate for 16 to-18-year olds
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: protect the entire education budget from early years through to post-16 education
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: guarantee all teachers in state schools will be qualified
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: appoint Directors of School Standards to drive up standards in every area
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: cap class sizes for five, six and seven-year-olds
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: ensure all young people study English and Maths to age 18.

text: We will help our families and communities to thrive
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As a country we value compassion, tolerance and a sense of decency.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But pressures on family life, growing inequality, anxieties about crime and anti-social behaviour, and a widespread loss of trust in our governing institutions, are creating insecurity in many communities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes a decent society grows out of family life and relationships, out of the work we do, and the local places to which we belong.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will help to create a more secure and inclusive society by building and strengthening the institutions that help individuals, families and communities to thrive.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Supporting families and relationships
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People’s relationships bind society together, and the family, in all its various shapes and sizes, is its bedrock.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But low pay, the pressures of work and caring for children and elderly relatives, have put families under increasing pressure.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will help families by expanding free childcare from 15 to 25 hours per week for working parents of three and four-year-olds, paid for with an increase in the bank levy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also introduce a legal guarantee for parents of primary school children to access wraparound childcare from 8am to 6pm through their local primary school.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As well as helping parents, this will provide children with before and after-school clubs and activities, helping to raise their aspirations and attainment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This will be underpinned by a new National Primary Childcare Service, a not for profit organisation to promote the voluntary and charitable delivery of quality extracurricular activities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour recognises the vital importance of the power of people’s relationships to build the capacity for love, care and resilience.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will prioritise early years intervention to give children and parents the best start in family life, and restore the role of Sure Start centres as family hubs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Sure Start will have an obligation to provide families with access to childcare, opening their facilities to charities and local childcare providers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: More widely, we will encourage local services to co-locate, so that they work together to shift from sticking plaster solutions to integrated early help.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will take a whole-family approach to policy making, supporting relationships, and the involvement of fathers, grandparents and relatives in the care, education and health of children.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: More fathers want to play an active role in their children’s lives and families want to spend more time together with a new baby.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will double the current two weeks of paternity leave to four weeks, and increase the amount of paternity pay from £140 to more than £260 a week.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Many grandparents want to be more involved in caring for their grandchildren, and we will support them in doing so.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As a result of this Government’s failures, the commitment to ending child poverty by 2020 is very unlikely to be met.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: However, we will never forget how important a decent basic income is to a child’s prospects and wellbeing.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: That is why we will keep the child poverty targets, and ask the Office for Budget Responsibility to monitor and report on progress.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will promote the care and educational achievement of our most vulnerable children
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and we will introduce mandatory reporting of child abuse.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will increase support for children in kinship (family and friends) care and their families, a group too often overlooked and undervalued.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to support Frontline and its innovative approach to training social workers, and teachers will receive better training for working with children with special educational needs and disabilities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Building new homes
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain is in the midst of the biggest housing crisis in a generation, with the lowest levels of house building in peacetime since the 1920s.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Young people have been priced out of home ownership.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Fewer affordable homes are being built, homelessness is rising, and millions face insecurity and poor standards in the private rented sector.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Everyone should be able to live in a secure home, whether they rent or buy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will make sure that at least 200,000 homes a year get built by 2020 – almost double the current level – by implementing the recommendations of the Lyons Review.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is only by building more homes that people’s aspiration for home ownership will be fulfilled.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our comprehensive plan to tackle the housing crisis will give local communities new powers to provide the homes they need, in the places they want to live.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To help young people and families get on the housing ladder, we will give local authorities the power to give first call to first time buyers on new homes in areas of housing growth.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will unlock a Future Homes Fund by requiring that the billions of pounds saved in Help to Buy ISAs be invested in increasing housing supply.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We want a housing market that rewards the building of high quality homes rather than land banking and speculation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will introduce greater transparency in the land market and give local authorities new ‘use it or lose it’ powers to encourage developers to build.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will increase competition in the housebuilding industry by backing small builders, including through our Help to Build scheme,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and by getting the public sector building again.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will build more affordable homes by prioritising capital investment for housing and by reforming the council house financing system.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give local authorities powers to reduce the number of empty homes, including higher council tax on long term empty properties.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And to boost the housing we need, we will start to build a new generation of garden cities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For the 11 million people who rent privately, we will legislate to make three-year tenancies the norm, with a ceiling on excessive rent rises.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A ban on unfair letting agent fees will save renters over £600.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will drive standards up by creating a national register of private landlords.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Homelessness is the ultimate symbol of the housing crisis.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour reduced homelessness by 70 per cent when we were last in office, but all forms of homelessness are back on the rise, with rough sleeping having increased by 55 per cent.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We are committed to reversing this trend by tackling the causes of homelessness and rough sleeping.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Restoring social security
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain needs a responsible and fair social security system that provides security when people lose their jobs
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: or fall sick,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: as well as a decent income when they retire.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The British people have always believed in the principle of contribution, rewarding those who pay in, helping people get back on their feet, and providing support in times of need.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To guarantee a decent social security system for the next generation, we need to keep costs under control.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Under this Government, the increase in low pay has left working families more reliant on tax credits and housing benefit, pushing up the social security bill.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To get the benefits bill under control, we need to tackle the root causes of rising spending, by making work pay and building more homes.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will allow local authorities that negotiate rent reductions on behalf of tenants who are claiming housing benefit, to retain some of the savings, on the condition that the money is invested in building homes.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will keep the household benefit cap and ask the Social Security Advisory Committee to examine if it should be lower in some areas.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will cap structural social security spending as part of each spending review, so that it is properly planned and controlled.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes in rewarding work and in restoring contribution to the heart of our system.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will not cut tax credits.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We want everyone who can to have the chance to contribute through paid work, so we will create a more tailored back-to-work system that helps people secure and keep jobs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will do more to help unemployed people get the skills they need for work, testing jobseekers’ Maths, English and IT skills within six weeks of them claiming benefits.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will be required to take up training where this will improve their chances of getting a job.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We support the principle behind Universal Credit – that there should be a smooth transition into work – but it must be affordable and fit for purpose, so we will pause and review the programme.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: There will be a guaranteed, paid job for all young people who have been out of work for one year,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and for all those over 25 years old and out of work for two years.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will be a job that they have to take, or lose their benefits.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will commission a replacement for the Work Programme at a more local level, working with local authorities to join up support for the long-term unemployed.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce a higher rate of Job Seekers Allowance for those who have contributed over years.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will be funded by extending the length of time people need to have worked to qualify.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Supporting disabled people to live independently
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Alongside strong and responsive public services, the social security system plays an important role in supporting many disabled people to live independently, and must always treat sick and disabled people with dignity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Half a million families have been hit by the Bedroom Tax, and two thirds of those affected are disabled, or have a disabled family member.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is cruel, and we will abolish it.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will reform the Work Capability Assessment and focus it on the support disabled people need to get into work.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give an independent scrutiny group of disabled people a central role in monitoring it.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will introduce a specialist support programme to ensure that disabled people who can work get more tailored help.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Older people
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Older people deserve to live a fulfilling life, to continue working if they wish, and to enjoy a secure retirement.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Older people have contributed all their lives and built the Britain that the next generation  will inherit.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So it is right that they are supported with a fair and sustainable pensions system, responsive health services and a system of care over which they have control.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will keep the triple-lock so that the state pension increases by inflation, earnings, or 2.5 per cent, whichever is highest.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And while increases in the state retirement age are necessary to keep our pensions system affordable, we will ensure that people have time to plan for changes.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We have taken the tough choice to restrict Winter Fuel Payments for the richest five per cent of pensioners,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: but we will guarantee that there will be no additional changes to the Winter Fuel Payments, free TV licences or bus passes for pensioners.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Alongside a decent state pension, we must ensure private pensions are good value for those who have saved.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will reform the pensions market so that pension providers put savers first, and protect consumers from retirement rip-offs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We support greater flexibility for those drawing down their pension pots, but there must be proper guidance for people to avoid mis-selling.
