text: Controlling immigration with fair rules
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For our country to stay strong, with the confidence to look outwards rather than inwards, people need to feel secure in the strength of our borders,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: our communities,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and in the workplace.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain has seen historically high levels of immigration in recent years, including low-skilled migration, which has given rise to public anxiety about its effects on wages, on our public services, and on our shared way of life.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Despite the Conservatives’ promise to reduce net migration to tens of thousands, it is now higher than it was when David Cameron entered Downing Street.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Broken promises erode trust.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will never cut Britain off from the rest of the world.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our economy and our society benefit from the talent and investment of people who come here, including university students coming to study.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But the system needs to be controlled and managed so that it is fair.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Low-skilled migration has been too high and needs to come down.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We need much stronger action to stop illegal immigration.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour’s plan starts with stronger borders
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will recruit an additional 1,000 borders staff, paid for by a small charge on non-visa visitors to the UK.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce stronger controls to prevent those who have committed serious crimes coming to Britain,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and to deport those who commit crimes while they are here.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce full exit checks, so that we can count people in and out of the country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Short-term student visitor visas have dramatically increased, so we will tighten the system to prevent abuse,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: whilst welcoming overseas university students who bring billions into Britain.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will keep the cap on workers from outside the EU.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We need fair rules at work to prevent the exploitation of migrant workers, which undercuts local wages and increases demand for further low-skilled migration.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will introduce a new law to stop employers undercutting wages by exploiting workers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will ban recruitment agencies from hiring only from overseas
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and crack down on rogue agencies by extending the remit of the Gangmasters Licensing Authority where there is evidence of abuse.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We need to strengthen our social integration and ensure that migrants can play their part in British society.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People working in public services, in public facing roles, will be required to speak English.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Those who come here will not be able to claim benefits for at least two years, and we will stop child benefit being sent to families living abroad.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will enforce immigration rules humanely and effectively.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will end the indefinite detention of people in the asylum and immigration system,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: ending detention for pregnant women
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and those who have been the victims of sexual abuse or trafficking
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will ensure Britain continues its proud history of providing refuge for those fleeing persecution by upholding our international obligations,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: including working with the UN to support vulnerable refugees from Syria.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Safer communities
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Crime creates fear and insecurity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We can only live happy and fulfilled lives if we know that we are safe, and that we are not at risk of violation of our person or property.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: For too many people in our country that is not the reality they see in their communities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Neighbourhood policing, the vital building block of British policing, is at risk of being destroyed.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Anti-social behaviour is too often tolerated, rather than dealt with.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Violent crimes have gone up, but fewer violent criminals are being caught.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Far too many victims of child sex abuse are being let down by the services that are supposed to keep them safe.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes British policing is at its best when it is rooted in local communities, proactively preventing crime, rather than simply reacting to emergencies.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will protect neighbourhood policing.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: By making different choices – to abolish Police and Crime Commissioners,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: end the subsidy of firearms licenses,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and mandate police forces to work closer together
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: – we will be able to safeguard over 10,000 police officers for the next three years.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This will be backed up by a new statutory Local Policing Commitment, guaranteeing neighbourhood policing in every community.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will strengthen community safety partnerships to give local people a role in setting priorities for neighbourhood policing and a say over the appointment of local police commanders.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To raise standards within policing, all police officers will be required to become Chartered Officers, holding a registration with the College of Policing, and able to be struck off for serious misconduct, just as doctors and lawyers can be.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A new Police Standards Authority will replace the discredited Independent Police Complaints Commission.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will work with the police to improve ethnic minority recruitment so that the police better reflect the communities they serve.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The next part of Labour’s plan is preventing crime occurring in the first place.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will nip anti-social behaviour in the bud by making offenders put right the wrong they have done, with payback orders replacing low-level cautions.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will ensure staff who work with the public are given greater protection, with tougher penalties for those who assault them.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The last Labour Government’s reforms of youth justice, which required agencies to collaborate in preventing youth offending, reduced both youth crime and the numbers of young people in prison.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The next Labour Government will extend this model, piloting a new approach to 18 to 20-year-old offenders, incentivising local authorities, police and probation services to work together to identify those at risk of drifting into criminal activity and, where possible, divert them into a more constructive way of life.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will work to embed restorative justice right across the youth justice system.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We know drug addiction continues to be a major cause of crime.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will ensure drug treatment services focus on the root causes of addiction,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: with proper integration between health, police and local authorities in the commissioning of treatment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will ban the sale and distribution of dangerous psychoactive substances, so called ‘legal highs’.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is clear that we need a radical change in our approach to dealing with child abuse.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will bring in tough new powers enabling the police to prevent an adult from contacting or communicating with a child if there is evidence of abuse,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and strengthen the vetting and barring regime.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A new child protection unit will be established to work across government, driving progress in the prevention of child abuse and sexual exploitation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We need prisons that both punish and rehabilitate people.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will do more to increase the amount of time prisoners spend working and learning.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Prisons will be measured by how successful they are in reforming prisoners and reducing their re-offending.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also raise professional standards amongst prison officers, including through the creation of Chartered Prison Officers,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and confront the neglected problem of staff corruption.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will enact Britain’s first Victims’ Law to give victims of crime a voice and an entitlement to minimum standards of service from criminal justice agencies.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Ending violence against girls and women
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Two women a week are killed by a current or former male partner.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: At least 750,000 children a year witness domestic violence.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Stopping violence against women and girls is a priority for Labour.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will publish a Violence against Women and Girls Bill,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: appoint a commissioner to set minimum standards in tackling domestic and sexual violence,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and provide more stable central funding for women’s refuges and Rape Crisis Centres.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will strengthen the law, banning the use of community resolutions as a response to domestic violence.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The gun licensing regime will be tightened, so that people with a history of domestic or sexual violence will not be given an unrestricted license.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will make changes to DNA retention, so that rape suspects have their DNA recorded and stored.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Victims of domestic violence need far better support.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will widen access to legal aid for victims of domestic violence.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Tackling the threat from extremism
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The threat from Islamist extremism is increasing.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Hundreds of British citizens have joined Islamic State – a movement that has engaged in savage violence, and racial and religious hatred.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The British people have faced down terrorist threats before and will do so again, standing united together, not allowing ourselves to be divided.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: With Labour, the security services will have the powers they need to disrupt and tackle terrorism.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Government were wrong to weaken counter terror powers by scrapping Control Orders.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: With Labour, dangerous suspects will be subject to proper controls.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Every government department will be engaged in the work of preventing extremism and fighting terrorism.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will implement a much more rigorous strategy for dealing with people returning from the Syrian conflict.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Alongside appropriate police action and prosecution, it will be mandatory for anyone returning to engage in a de-radicalisation programme designed to confront them with the consequences of their actions.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will need to update our investigative laws to keep up with changing technology, strengthening both the powers available, and the safeguards that protect people’s privacy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This is why Labour argued for an independent review, currently being undertaken by David Anderson.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will strengthen the oversight of our intelligence agencies to make sure the public can continue to have confidence in the vital work that they do to keep us safe.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To defeat the threats of Islamist terrorism, we must also engage with the personal, cultural and wider factors that turn young people to extremism.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Prevent programme was set up under the last Labour Government to stop young people becoming radicalised.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But this Government has cut the funding and narrowed its focus.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Much of the work to engage Muslim communities has been lost.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will overhaul the programme to involve communities in countering extremist propaganda,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: stopping young people being groomed,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and also building resilient institutions for social integration.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We applaud those faith communities who have pioneered an inter-faith dialogue for the common good.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will take a zero-tolerance approach to hate crime, such as anti-Semitism and Islamophobia.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will challenge prejudice before it grows, whether in schools, universities or on social media.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will strengthen the law on disability, homophobic, and transphobic hate crime.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Arts and culture
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes that art and culture gives form to our hopes and aspirations and defines our heritage as a nation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The arts allow us to celebrate our common humanity in the creation and celebration of beauty. The arts should belong to all and be open to all to take part in.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will guarantee a universal entitlement to a creative education so that every young person has access to cultural activity and the arts by strengthening creative education in schools and after-school clubs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Institutions that receive arts funding will be required to open up their doors to young people,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and we will work with public bodies to rebalance arts funding across the country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The last Labour Government made admission to our national museums and galleries free to all, leading to a major increase in the number of people experiencing our greatest cultural treasures.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We reaffirm our commitment to universal free admission to ensure that our great works of art and national heritage can be enjoyed in all parts of the country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Creativity is the powerhouse of a prosperous economy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is the source of economic innovation and a powerful force in social renewal.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will increase the number of apprenticeships in the creative industries.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will create a Prime Minister’s Committee on the Arts, Culture and Creative Industries, with a membership drawn from all sectors and regions.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Committee will bring issues of concern direct to the attention of the Prime Minister.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Sport
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Sport brings us together in an expression of our local and national pride.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is where young people learn about leadership, teamwork, the pursuit of excellence and strength of character.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: With a Labour Government our children will participate in a minimum of two hours of organised sport every week at school.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Football clubs are an important part of many people’s identity and sense of belonging.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They are more than just businesses.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But despite their importance in the lives of their members and supporters, too often there are no effective means for fans to have a say in how their clubs are run.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will provide the means for supporters to be a genuine part of their clubs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce legislation to enable accredited supporters trusts to appoint and remove at least two of the directors of a football club and to purchase shares when the club changes hands.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also review the role of fan participation in other sports.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will ensure the Premier League delivers on its promise to invest five per cent of its domestic and international television rights income into funding the grassroots.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Protecting our environment
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We feel passionately about our local landscapes, our open spaces and wildlife.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Land and nature are part of our common home and inheritance, and they contribute to our sense of identity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In a globalised world, our local environment provides us with a sense of place and belonging.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As we set out in more detail later on, a Labour Government will play a leading global role in tackling climate change.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: However, it will not be enough to simply mitigate the threat of climate change.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We must adapt to its damaging effects, which are impacting on us today.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will produce an ambitious adaptation programme,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and the new Infrastructure Commission will prioritise investment in flood prevention.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will deal with the problems of air pollution by giving local authorities the powers they need, backed up by a national framework.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour has always believed that everyone should have access to nature, whoever they are, or wherever they live.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So we will keep our forests in public ownership
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and promote access to green spaces in local planning.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will support the work of the Natural Capital Committee to protect and improve wildlife habitats and green spaces, and make them an important part of our thriving tourism industry.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will build on our strong record on animal welfare – starting with an end to the Government’s ineffective and cruel badger cull.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will improve the protection of dogs and cats,

text: ban wild animals in circuses,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: defend the hunting ban
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and deal with wildlife crime associated with shooting.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We want to create a world-leading Food, Farm and Fisheries sector that creates better paid jobs and apprenticeships across the rural economy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will put in place a long-term strategy for the sector,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: promote the best of British produce,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and expand the role of the supermarket watchdog to support the growth of the sector,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and protect food producers from unfair practices by the major supermarkets.

text: and ensure all primary schools guarantee access to wraparound childcare from 8am to 6pm
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: double paternity leave from two to four weeks

text: and increase paternity pay by more than £100 a week
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: ensure at least 200,000 new homes a year are built by 2020,

text: with first priority for local first time buyers

text: provide security for renters by guaranteeing three-year tenancies

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: make it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: protect neighbourhood policing by safeguarding over 10,000 frontline police officers over the next three years
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will reform government to give more power to people
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People who live in this country know that too much power is concentrated in too few hands.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Those who make decisions on behalf of others, whether they are in Westminster, the European Union, in business, the media, or the public sector, are too often unaccountable.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our over-centralised system of government has prevented our nations, cities, county regions and towns from being able to take control and change things for themselves.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will end a century of centralisation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes meaningful and lasting change for the better is only possible when people are given the power to change things for themselves.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our governing mission is to break out of the traditional top-down, 'Westminster knows best approach', and devolve power and decision-making to people and their local communities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: From the City of London to Silicon Valley the world’s best industries tend to be clustered geographically.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And too often economic challenges can be too, from our coalfields to some of our isolated seaside towns.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So a Labour government will unleash the potential of our city and county regions to drive economic growth and prosperity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will reform institutions and devolve power to deal with the causes of our economic problems,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and we will encourage local authorities to innovate to better serve their communities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Instead of imposing change on communities, we will give them more control over schools, health care, policing, skills, housing and transport, making use of their insights into what works and what does not.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will promote and encourage a model of citizenship based on participation and shared responsibility.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: These measures are the start of big changes in how we govern ourselves as a union of nations.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They will begin to transform the relationship between the citizen and the state.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will further develop digital government to enable better communication, more collaboration, and sharing of data between services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will make services and transactions more efficient and simpler for people to use.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: To create a more connected society we will support making digital government more inclusive, transparent and accountable.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to back the principle of ‘open data by default’, releasing public sector performance data wherever possible.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A better politics
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give 16 and 17-year-olds the vote by May 2016,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and improve the curriculum for citizenship education, so young people have the knowledge they need to play a full part in British society.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will encourage young people’s volunteering and social action by supporting the #iwill campaign of ‘Step up to Serve’, and the National Citizens Service.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Drawing on the work of the Political and Constitutional Reform Committee, we will take steps to ensure that the move to individual electoral registration does not leave millions unregistered,

text: nor lead to constituencies that fail to take into account the people who live in them.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This will include block registration by universities and care homes,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: extending Northern Ireland’s successful Schools Initiative,

text: and exploring the scope for an automatic system of registration.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour remains committed to reforming political party funding and taking the big money out of politics by capping individual donations to parties.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will safeguard our democracy by repealing the Lobbying Act, which has gagged charities, and replace it with a tougher statutory register of lobbyists.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will ban MPs from holding paid directorships and consultancies.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will reform the legislative process to strengthen the public’s voice and to better hold the government to account.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The United Kingdom
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes in the historic union of our nations working together for the common good.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But as devolution has continued to gather pace, our union now needs to evolve.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As a priority, we will set up a people-led Constitutional Convention to directly address this and to drive political reform of Westminster.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour is committed to replacing the House of Lords with an elected Senate of the Nations and Regions,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: to represent every part of the United Kingdom,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and to improve the democratic legitimacy of the second chamber.

text: It is also time to consider how English MPs can have a greater role in the scrutiny of legislation that only affects England.

text: England
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will embark on the biggest devolution of power to our English city and county regions in a hundred years with an English Devolution Act.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will transfer £30 billion of funding to city and county regions, along with new powers over economic development, skills, employment, housing, and business support.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This will include control over local transport systems so that in future, local bodies can integrate trains, buses, trams and cycling into a single network.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will enable city and county regions to retain 100 per cent of additional business rates raised from growth in their area.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Fair funding will be restored across England, alongside longer term multi-year budgets, so that local authorities can plan ahead on the basis of need in their area and protect vital services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And an English Regional Cabinet Committee, chaired by the Prime Minister, will be convened regularly, attended by the relevant Secretaries of State and leaders of our major city and county regions.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In return for greater devolution of funding and responsibility, we will establish local Public Accounts Committees, so that every pound spent by local bodies creates value for money for local taxpayers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Devolution does not end at town halls.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Local people know best about the complex problems they face, and they are best placed to work out how to solve them.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The English New Deal begins the process of giving individuals and communities more power and control over how they are governed and over the design of their public services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will support people who need care to live independently,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: help troubled families to turn their lives around,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and make sure that every child has a good start in life with early-years intervention and quality childcare.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give English people a stronger voice in shaping the future of their local NHS services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Patients and the public will have a seat at the table from the very start of any process that draws up plans for change, including changes to hospital services.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will give local communities more power to shape their high streets, and so preserve their local identities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Councils will be given the power to require particular types of shops to apply for planning permission, allowing them to restrict the number of payday lenders or other shops that are clustering on a single high street.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Communities will be able to review betting shop licenses in their area and reduce the number of fixed-odds betting terminals in existing betting shops – or ban them entirely – in response to local concerns.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Scotland
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In September 2014, people across Scotland voted overwhelmingly for change.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will keep its vow and implement the Smith Agreement in full.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will go further, with a Home Rule Bill to give extra powers to Scotland over tax, welfare and jobs.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Rates of income tax will be set in Scotland.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Billions of pounds of social security spending will be devolved, including benefits that support disabled people
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Work Programme will also be devolved along with a greater ability to invest in capital projects.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The new devolution settlement will recognise the strength and security offered by being part of the United Kingdom.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will maintain the Barnett formula,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and Scotland will continue to benefit from pooling and sharing resources across the UK.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Wales
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will put Welsh devolution on the same statutory basis as Scottish devolution, with a clear principle that powers are devolved unless specifically reserved,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and that a Welsh legislature is a permanent feature of our constitutional arrangements.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will take forward proposals from the Silk Commission to extend the power the people of Wales have over their elections, transport and energy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: An all-Wales Policing Plan will give the Welsh people the ability to shape local policing in Wales.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Wales must not be unfairly disadvantaged by the Barnett formula.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: So while the Conservatives have cut the Welsh budget by £1.5 billion, we will establish a fair funding settlement for Wales, with the guarantee of a funding floor.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Northern Ireland
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour is proud of the role we played in bringing peace and stability to Northern Ireland through the Good Friday Agreement, and successive agreements.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A Labour Government will engage proactively with the Northern Ireland Executive to support continued political progress, and deliver on it’s vision of a shared future.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will ensure the economic pact between the UK Government and Northern Ireland Executive is focused on stimulating jobs and growth which contribute to reducing unemployment and poverty in Northern Ireland.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to work with the Irish Government to secure peace in Northern Ireland and strengthen relations between our two countries.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Rights and equality
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Labour Party has always led on challenging prejudice and discrimination and we will continue to do so.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: People's differences are not excuses to treat them badly or unjustly.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The next Labour Government will go further in reducing discrimination against women,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: requiring large companies to publish their gender pay gap
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and strengthening the law against maternity discrimination.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Where there is evidence more progress is needed, we will enforce the relevant provisions within the Equality Act.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We want our Parliament to look more like Britain.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We are proud of our record in strengthening the representation of women,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: ethnic minorities,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and other under-represented groups in politics and public life.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We remain committed to achieving a better balance in Parliament, including through the use of all-women shortlists in Labour Party parliamentary selection contests.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will establish a comprehensive race equality strategy to break down the barriers still faced by black and minority ethnic communities.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our aim is to make sure our national institutions, including Parliament, the police, judiciary, civil service, and the boardrooms of our companies, are more representative of our diverse country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also build on our history of championing LGBT rights, tackling homophobia with tougher laws at home and greater engagement abroad.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain has a long tradition of liberty and the rule of law,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and Labour has a proud record of extending these to our most vulnerable citizens, by promoting equality and opportunity for all.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Thanks to the Human Rights Act, some of our most vulnerable citizens, including disabled people and victims of crime, have been given a powerful means of redress.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Conservatives want to leave the European Convention of Human Rights, and abolish the Human Rights Act.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A Labour Government will stand up for citizens’ individual rights, protecting the Human Rights Act and reforming, rather than walking away from, the European Court of Human Rights.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will make sure that access to legal representation, a cornerstone of our democracy, is not determined by personal wealth, but remains available to those that need it.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our Freedom of Information laws have shone a light into the darker corners of government and are a crucial check on the power of the Executive.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will extend their scope so that public services run by large private companies are included.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will repair the damage done by this Government to the vital safeguard offered by judicial review.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The media
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The free flow of information and of different points of view is crucial for open debate and countering concentrations of unaccountable power.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: That is why the concentration of media power in too few hands is damaging to our democracy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: No one media owner should be able to exert undue influence on public opinion and policy makers.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: No media company should have so much power that those who run it believe themselves above the rule of law.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Yet the current system for protecting against these threats is inadequate.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will take steps to protect the principle of media plurality, so that no media outlet can get too big, including updating our rules for the 21st century media environment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We remain strongly committed to the implementation of the recommendations of the Leveson Inquiry.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We expect the industry to establish a mechanism for independent self-regulation, which delivers proper redress for individuals, as set out in the Royal Charter, and agreed by all parties in Parliament.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We made a promise to victims of the phone hacking scandal.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We stand by that promise and will keep it.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our system of public service broadcasting is one of Britain’s great strengths.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The BBC makes a vital contribution to the richness of our cultural life,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and we will ensure that it continues to do so while delivering value for money.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will also commit to keeping Channel 4 in public ownership,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: so it continues to produce vital public content.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will stand up for Britain’s interests in Europe and the world
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We live in turbulent times.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The rise of ISIL, an aggressive Russia threatening its neighbours in eastern Europe, and continuing economic uncertainty in the Eurozone, are each a challenge to our national security.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour is an internationalist party and believes Britain must engage with the global challenges we face, but not try and solve them on our own.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We believe the Conservatives are damaging the interests of our country by turning their backs on Europe, and isolating us abroad.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will strengthen our national security,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: stand up for human rights,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and work with other countries to tackle terrorism,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: climate change,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and eliminate extreme poverty globally.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain has a unique influence in the world.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We are the only country that is a member of the UN Security Council, NATO, the G7, the G20, the Commonwealth and the EU.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: With Labour, Britain’s response to threats to our security will be based on enduring principles.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will protect our national interests, and strengthen our long-standing international alliances, in particular, our membership of NATO
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and the European Union.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will advance our international engagement, rather than retreating into isolation.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will maintain the best Armed Forces in the world,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: capable of responding to changing threats in an unpredictable security landscape.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will support human rights, always putting individual freedom and democracy at the heart of our foreign policy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: One of our first acts in government will be to conduct a wide-ranging review of Britain’s place in the world and how we can best uphold our values and the national interest.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Global challenges
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will take a multilateral approach to global challenges.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to uphold our key alliances.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: These include the United States,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: our allies in Africa and Latin America,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and our partners from across the Commonwealth.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: They also include the European Union.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The crisis in Ukraine over the past year has demonstrated the importance of NATO and the EU standing up to external threats in Europe’s eastern, and southern neighbourhoods.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will continue to advocate an EU which looks outward to promote stability, peace and prosperity on its borders.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Most immediately we will work with our allies to counter and confront terrorism.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: ISIL’s barbarism and expansionist ideology, alongside terrorist groups such as Al Qaeda and Al-Shabaab, represent a particular threat to global security.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Following a request from the Iraqi Prime Minister, it was right that the UK joined other nations in air strikes against ISIL targets in Iraq.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: But military action alone will not defeat ISIL.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A long-term multinational political strategy, with regional actors playing a central role, is essential for tackling the rise of extremism across the region.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A Labour Government will always do what is necessary to defend our country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Beyond self-defence, Labour has been clear about the need to learn the lessons of previous interventions, especially the 2003 invasion of Iraq.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue the approach we have taken in this Parliament.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: A Labour Government would not propose the use of military force without judging whether reasonable diplomatic efforts have been exhausted,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: the action is proportionate and in partnership with allies,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: whether there is a clear legal basis,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and if there is a clear plan, not just for winning the war but also for building a lasting peace.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Peace and security in the Middle East are one of Labour’s most important foreign policy objectives.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We remain committed to a comprehensive two-state solution – a secure Israel alongside a viable and independent state of Palestine.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: There can be no military solution to this conflict and all sides must avoid taking action that would make peace harder to achieve.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will continue to press for an immediate return to meaningful negotiations leading to a diplomatic resolution.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will also continue to honour the UK’s commitment to support Afghanistan as it seeks to secure an inclusive and durable political settlement.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In December 2014, the NATO-led ISAF mission in Afghanistan ended.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We can never repay the debt owed to the brave servicemen and women who have sacrificed and risked their lives in Afghanistan to protect our national security.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As power and wealth continues to shift from West to East, our relationship with Asia will be fundamental to our long-term prosperity.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will set up an Asia Step-Change Taskforce to ensure a more strategic and effective dialogue with regional partners, including China,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: both in the commerical realm,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and in other areas, from cultural exchange  to human rights.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This commitment to universal human rights will be at the heart of our foreign policy across the world.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to promote women’s rights.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will join with those campaigning to attain gender equality, the eradication of poverty and inclusive economic growth.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will appoint a Global Envoy for Religious Freedom, and establish a multi-faith advisory council on religious freedom within the Foreign and Commonwealth Office.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And we will appoint an International LGBT Rights Envoy to promote respect for the human rights of LGBT people,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and work towards the decriminalisation of homosexuality worldwide.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Europe
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour believes that our membership of the European Union is central to our prosperity and security.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It is why we will work to change the EU, so that it operates in the best interests of our country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And it is why we will re-engage with our European allies to protect our national interest after five years of Britain being sidelined in Europe and isolated abroad.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The economic case for membership of the EU is overwhelming.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Over 3 million jobs in the UK are linked to trade with the European Union,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and almost half of our trade and foreign investment comes from the EU.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Competing in the single market, with the best companies in the world, drives competitiveness and innovation for firms in all parts of our economy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: And it helps boost the living standards of people across Britain, encouraging the inflow of capital and investment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Our reforms will help deliver a Europe focused on jobs and growth, not simply more austerity and rising unemployment.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: ` Labour will focus on the completion of the single market and tougher budget discipline,

title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and social security rules, as well as pushing for stronger transitional controls, which will enable member states to manage the flow of workers for longer when new countries join.

text: We will also continue to open up EU decision-making, and implement institutional reforms to help build levels of trust among European citizens.

text: Labour’s priority in government will be protecting the NHS

text: and tackling the cost-of-living crisis.

text: Defence and our Armed Forces
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The primary duty of any government is the defence of the nation and its interests.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: That is why Labour is committed to ensuring the UK has responsive, high-tech Armed Forces, with the capability to respond to emerging, interconnected threats, in an unpredictable security landscape.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will conduct a Strategic Defence and Security Review in the first year of government, with an inclusive national debate on the security and defence challenges facing the country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: It will be fiscally responsible and strategically driven, focusing on the obstacles that impede our Armed Forces from effective response to threats.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: At the heart of our defence policy are the service men and women, both regulars and reservists, who risk their lives for their country.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour will strengthen the covenant between our nation and our Armed Forces, veterans and their families.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will create a Veterans’ Register to make certain our veterans receive proper support on leaving service.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will continue to roll out Labour’s Veterans’ Interview Programme, in which companies voluntarily guarantee an interview for job-seeking ex-forces personnel.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will introduce legislation to make discrimination against members of our Armed Forces illegal,

text: and we will enshrine the Military Covenant in the NHS Constitution.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The UK defence and security industry is a key contributor to our economy, with a turnover of £22 billion a year.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will work to secure defence jobs across the UK,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: protect the supply chain and support industry to grow Britain’s defence exports.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: In partnership with industry, we will put accountability, value for money, interoperability and sustainability at the centre of defence procurement.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Britain needs to be prepared to counter the threat of cyber-attacks.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We have already called on the Government to require every company working with the Ministry of Defence, regardless of its size or the scale of its work, to sign up to a cyber-security charter.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: This would reduce the risk of hackers using small suppliers to break into the systems of major defence companies or the department itself.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will consult on creating a statutory requirement for all private companies, to report serious cyber-attacks threatening our national infrastructure.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: Labour remains committed to a minimum, credible, independent nuclear capability, delivered through a Continuous At-Sea Deterrent.

text: We will actively work to increase momentum on global multilateral disarmament efforts and negotiations,
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: and look at further reductions in global stockpiles and the numbers of weapons.

text: Climate change
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: We will put climate change at the heart of our foreign policy.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: As the terrible impact of the floods in Britain showed last year, climate change is now an issue of national, as well as global security.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: From record droughts in California, to devastating typhoons in the Philippines, the world is already seeing the effects we once thought only future generations would experience.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change has made clear that if the world is going to hold warming below two degrees (the internationally-agreed goal), global emissions need to peak in around 2020, and then decline rapidly to reach net zero emissions by the second half of this century.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The weaker the action now, the more rapid and costly the reductions will need to be later.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015

text: The effects of climate change hit the poor, the hardest.
title: Britain can be better. The Labour Party Manifesto 2015
